branchCategory.name: C(L)KQG*, Pin Clamp Cylinder, Built-in Standard Magnet
branchCategory.description: <p>SMC's pin clamp cylinder with a standard magnet, series C(L)KQ&nbsp;series&nbsp;was designed with 4 body types for a broad range of installation conditions.&nbsp; There are 55 types of guide pins available and an optional locking mechanism.&nbsp; C(L)KQ series has positioning and clamping at one time.&nbsp; Precision adjustment of clamping height is possible by choosing the with-shim type.&nbsp; Adjustment range: 0.5 to 3mm.</p>
